About.paragraph: Our mission is to empower businesses with the full potential of Microsoft 365, delivering unparalleled IT consulting services from out of the box deployments to fully bespoke solutions. As a dedicated team of experts, we are committed to elevating your organization's productivity, efficiency, and success across the entire Microsoft 365 platform.
About.paragraph2: Our primary focus is on customer satisfaction, understanding your unique needs, and tailoring solutions that align perfectly with your business objectives. We strive to become your trusted partner, offering personalized support and innovative strategies that drive high ROI in Microsoft 365. By pairing consulting services with Learning & Development we ensure that our clients not only have the systems in place to help them succeed, but the knowledge to put those systems to use effectively and efficiently.
About.paragraph3: Through continuous collaboration, industry-leading expertise, and a passion for technological excellence, we aim to unlock the true value of Microsoft 365 for your organization. Our mission is to empower you with the tools and knowledge to optimize your operations, foster growth, and gain a competitive edge in the ever-evolving digital landscape.
About.paragraph4: We firmly believe that the key to our clients' success lies not only in the development and implementation of effective solutions but also in ensuring that their users possess the necessary knowledge to utilize these systems proficiently in their daily workflows. Understanding that building the solution is only one part of the equation, we go the extra mile by offering comprehensive training programs to equip our clients' frontline workers with the technical expertise they need to maximize the benefits of our solutions.
About.paragraph5: With nearly two decades of expertise in technical training and instructional design, our dedicated team possesses the skills and knowledge to create tailored training programs that precisely cater to our clients' unique requirements. We work closely with our clients to identify specific user needs and then develop training modules that effectively communicate the essential technical knowledge, empowering every user to leverage the technology solutions to their fullest potential in their day-to-day operations.
Why: Business Intelligence Analytics with Power BI
Why2: Microsoft Teams, Teams Rooms, & Telephony Deployments
Enterprise Grade Custom Applications with Power Platform and Dataverse

Services.name: Microsoft 365 for Small Business Owners
Services.text: This class is designed to help small business owners understand the features and capabilities of the Microsoft 365 platform, and put those tools to use for their business. Business owners will gain a great understanding of how the system works and how to leverage those tools to benefit their business.
Services.italics: This class also includes a 1 hour follow up call with a member of our Client Services team after class. During this call you can discuss your current needs and get guidance on your Microsoft 365 setup, design, or operations.

moreInfoData.title: Working with SharePoint Lists and Libraries
subPoints: Creating SharePoint Pages to Drive Engagement

moreInfoData.title: Business Process Automation with Microsoft Power Automate (Flow)

Services.name: Microsoft 365 For Power Users
Services.text: This class is designed for Power Users who will be creating SharePoint sites, designing and implementing business processes, and doing day to day management of the Microsoft 365 environment. This class is for those students who already have a good foundational knowledge of Microsoft 365.
Services.description: In this class you learn about all of the tools available to you and your business and how to best leverage those tools. Clients will receive lectures on the biggest topics, live demos by the instructor as well as hands on labs during class.

moreInfoData.title: Tracking Tasks and Projects with Planner

Services.name: Microsoft 365 for End Users
Services.text: This introductory class offers workers a quick ramp up to being skilled at SharePoint and other Microsoft 365 tools. This is the perfect class for those wanting to get a great foundational knowledge of SharePoint and Microsoft 365
Services.description: This class is designed for those users who are new to the Microsoft 365 platform or those who are looking to increase their base knowledge of the system. The main focus of this class is how SharePoint works as the backbone of the Microsoft 365 platform. Users will gain knowledge on working with documents in SharePoint libraries and how to work with data stored in SharePoint lists.

moreInfoData.title: Working with Data in SharePoint Lists

Testimonials.text: This team is extremely patient and highly skilled. If you need SharePoint or any Microsoft 365 work done, this is who you want on your side
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: Highly recommend Scott and his team, they are extremely knowledgeable for all things related to Microsoft Teams and were a big help to our company. Thank you and we will definitely keep you in mind for future projects.
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: Scott and his team are absolutely wonderful! Timely responses, flexible to changing demands, always willing to help and go the extra mile.
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: Scott and his team have been great to work with! They are great communicators and very knowledgeable about SharePoint. They guided us through a successful transition from an intranet to SharePoint, making sure that the platform is designed to meet our goals and needs. Additionally, they trained our staff in an easy-to-understand manner so that it has been a smooth transition! We will definitely use Scott and his team for additional work in the future. I highly recommend!
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: Scott and his team are some of the best consultants we've found. They are so easy to work with, fast to respond with questions, and always ready to help. They helped us with licensing questions, a complicated migration from G-Suite, ongoing engineering work, SharePoint implementations, Power Apps development, training for our employees, and more. Can't thank you enough Scott!
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: Scott and his team is very talented, knowledgeable and professional both as a subject matter expect and in-person trainer. We initially hired Scott to just create an SoW for the training program but based on further conversations and his ability to bring more color to the program hired him to actually present the whole program to our client. Our client was super happy and pleased with Scott's performance and knowledge. Super happy to work with Scott again and recommend him to our network.
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Team.name: Jennifer Wert
Team.job: Chief of Staff & Client Services Specialist
